articles.content: The MoU with GSPC is focused on blending green hydrogen in GSPC’s gas networks and setting up green hydrogen fuelling stations in Gujarat. The MoU exchange was conducted between NTPC CMD Gurdeep Sing… [+876 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft surpasses Apple to become the world’s most valuable company for the first time in 2 years as the iPhone maker hits a patch of ‘nothing special’ - Fortune
articles.description: While both were part of the so-called Magnificent 7’s powerful rally in 2023, their fortunes have diverged this year.

articles.title: Car sales in India drive past 4-million mark in 2023 - The Economic Times
